description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe game frontend, including theme management, game board layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game board with maximum width and centered margin.

classes.name: score-board
classes.description: Displays the scores and is styled with a primary color background.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Defines the grid layout of the game cells.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Represents a single cell in the game board, styled for appearance and interaction.

classes.name: game-actions
classes.description: Container for action buttons related to the game.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base style for all buttons in the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styling for colors and animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header element for the app with specific layout and style.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
